column1: Smoque BBQ////Unfortunately Smoque always misses the mark. Maybe my bbq palate is slightly different from everyone else
column2: like having a preference for certain beers over others. But the thing that bugs me every time is the dry
column4: and flavorless pulled pork. The food always smells amazing
column5: but the flavor is just not there. Having to drown your bbq in sauce is a sign of bland bbq...sorry.
